1.1.1.name: wordpress/eshop-custom-types
1.1.1.description: This is a simple plugin that will allow an admin to select exactly which Post types eShop should handle - adding custom types and/or removing default ones (page, and post). It also fixes eshop_list_cat_tags shortcode by making it play nicely with Custom Taxonomies.
